resume_text:
NAME: Charlie Brown
EMAIL: charlie.brown@email.com
PHONE: (555) 456-7890

SUMMARY:
DevOps Engineer with 5 years of experience in automating infrastructure and streamlining deployment pipelines. Expertise in cloud technologies and CI/CD practices.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Ansible, Git

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions LLC - DevOps Engineer (2020 - Present)
- Automated infrastructure provisioning using Terraform and CloudFormation.
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.

System Admin Co. - System Administrator (2019 - 2020)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers.
- Deployed and configured applications.

EDUCATION:
MIT - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2019)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
